name: Retail Outlet
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Happiness] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from each Trade Route

civilopediaText.text: Various ARC branded products line its shelves, popular among the wealthy and brimming with retail profits.

name: Financial Intelligence Agency
uniques: Only available <if [Spy Satellite Network] is constructed in all [non-[Puppeted]] cities>
Consumes [1] [Digital Storage Space]
[+1 Gold] from all [Gold] buildings
All newly-trained [Stealth Infantry] units [in this city] receive the [Spook] promotion
[+20]% spy effectiveness [in all cities]
[-20]% enemy spy effectiveness [in all cities]
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

civilopediaText.text: Ensuring ARC's financial stability, in various ways.

name: Automated Heavy Industry
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [Armored] units [in this city]
[+5]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in this city]
[+10]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: A more massive version of the Robotics Assembly Plant, and almost entirely automated.

name: Urban Commune
uniques: Prefab

civilopediaText.text: The cramped living conditions in ole Earth's PAC territories has resulted in a shared living space where colonists could relax - or create things, or grow things.

name: Market District
uniques: [+1 Gold] from [Bonus resource] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from [Strategic resource] tiles [in this city]
[+2 Gold] <during We Love The King Day>

civilopediaText.text: A sprawling general market that takes up a district, businesses of all kinds are thriving here. Try out the street food!

name: Diplomatic Office
uniques: [+3 Culture] <when not at war>
[-5]% maintenance cost for [All] buildings [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Envoys and dignitaries mingle with diplomats and bureaucrats in this building.

name: Cultural Square
uniques: Prefab
[+1 Culture] <during We Love The King Day>
[+2 Culture] <during a Golden Age>

civilopediaText.text: This area provides authentic old Earth recreational and cultural activities, from sports to dances and festivals. Everyone is welcome to join.

name: Sermon Station
uniques: Prefab
Only available <when religion is enabled>
[Wounded] Units adjacent to this city heal [5] HP per turn when healing
Destroyed when the city is captured

uniques: [+1 Food] from [Tubers] tiles [in this city]

[+1 Gold] from [Dairy Aphid] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Improving farmers' livelihoods by offering reasonable loans and a place to share successful agricultural methods.

name: Orbital Industry
uniques: Orbital
[+5]% [Production] [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: 3D printers and assorted industrial infrastructure in orbit, benefiting greatly from the low gravity environment.

name: Orbital Habitat
uniques: Orbital
Provides [2] [Digital Storage Space]

civilopediaText.text: An orbital station designed for human habitation, it is intended to be fully self-sufficient.

name: Covert Base
uniques: New [Military] units start with [15] XP [in this city]
New [Stealth Infantry] units start with [15] XP [in this city]
New [Submarine] units start with [15] XP [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: A well-hidden and off-the-grid military base, specializing in covert ops.

name: Underwater Complex
uniques: Prefab
Must be next to [Coast]
[+1 Science] <after discovering [Info Networks]>
[+1 Culture] <after discovering [Net Culture]>
[-10]% enemy spy effectiveness [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Expansive underwater tunnels and facilities for habitation and scientific matters.

name: Integrated Farms
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Hydroponics Field] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Food] from [Habitation Dome] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Food] per [3] population [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Crops grown on and around buildings, parks yielding food vegetables, personal mini-hydroponics in every home.

name: Green Infrastructure
uniques: Provides [1] [Digital Storage Space]
[+1 Food, +1 Gold] from [Road] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Food, +2 Gold] from [Railroad] tiles [in this city]
[+2 Food] from [Great Improvement] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Eco-friendly materials used on infrastructure projects, renewable or long-lasting power sources, a bit more greenery in your everyday cityscape.

name: Seawall
uniques: Must be next to [Coast]
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: A huge coastal wall to keep the water out, very useful during storms and sieges.
